directions: In a serving bowl, toss together the red bell pepper, green bell pepper, tomatoes, celery, bean sprouts and onion. Stir in the Italian dressing just before serving. This salad can also be stored in a resealable bag in the refrigerator until you are ready to serve it.
ingredients: 2 red bell pepper, seeded and diced
2 green bell peppers, seeded and diced
1/2 cup Italian salad dressing, or as needed
title: Tom's Crunchy Salad
